name: RocketNaut Arena ULTIMATE
description:
RocketNaut Arena Ultimate is a competitive local multiplayer game designed for 2-4 players. Propel yourself with explosive force, navigate stages with clever maneuvering, and vanquish your foes before they have the chance to return fire!

Features 3 game modes and now 14 levels, each with their own unique themes and backgrounds.

Controls:

XB360 or XBO controller - Left stick to rotate, A to fire, Start to Pause

PS3 Controller - Dpad to rotate, Square to fire, R2 to Pause

PS4 Controller - Left stick to rotate, Square to fire, R2 to Pause
